name: Cantrip
description: This is the first spell any mage learns, designed to teach them to manipulate mana to accomplish many minor tasks with a minimum of effort.  Eventually this becomes reflexive and you can simply do things at will with no spell casting required, just using background mana.

name: cantrip
description: This is a representation of your cantrip spell.  You can use this as a substitute for many minor tools.  You wear it.

name: Magic Missile
description: This spell hurls a long thin bolt (vaguely resembling an arrow) of magical energy at the target, it is commonly taught for basic self defense to trainees because of its simplicity.

name: Improved Magic Missile
description: An improved and optimized version of magic missile, which was never intended for combat use, but as a self defense and learning spell.  This version is for combat.

name: Magic Missile Burst
description: Creates a group of Improved Magic Missiles to strike your chosen foes all at once.

name: Frozen Grasp
description: This quick spell slams a target that you touch with intense cold that probably freezes them solid.  At high levels it can reach a short distance.

name: Chill
description: This spell rapidly and dramatically lowers the temperature in an area to the point that it does considerable damage.

name: Conjure Skittering Screecher
description: conjures a creature that resembles a 6-legged spider, but just one central sphere covered in mouths with fangs, the legs end in clawed handlike appendages, it screeches loudly through its many mouths, the screams of terror from those it killed before it encountered you.
